channel.title: Shop area error please help!
channel.description:
Okay i moved the NPC's that do the shops in my server and now whenever i trade them i get disconnected
Before i moved them they worked fine and its only the ones i moved that disconnect me
What did i do? and how do i fix it?
added a pic below

item.title: Shop area error please help!
item.dc:creator: @skaterb0y12 skaterb0y12
item.description:
@skaterb0y12 wrote:

thanks ill try it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 12:00:11 am[/size][hr][quote=“peoplereaper2, post:7, topic:317460”]i had the same problem before send all the npc’s you spawned to the cords 9999 9999 and put extra ones in at the shops that worked for me[/quote]
no it didnt work
